table.name: vtiger_mtbf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_mtbf` ( `mtbfid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `subject` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`mtbfid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_mtbfcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_mtbfcf` ( `mtbfid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`mtbfid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
